http.400: Sorry, the data you have submitted is not valid.
http.403: Sorry, you are not authorized to access this page.
http.404: Sorry, the page you visited does not exist.
http.405: Sorry, the HTTP verb you used is not supported for this URL.
http.500: Sorry, there is an error on the server.
http.error: Sorry, something went wrong. Please bear with us.

error.concurrencyFailure: Another user modified this data at the same time as you. Your changes were rejected.
